divs: Sighting Details3 perfect lights in a riangle shape no noise looks like a reflection of water under it from the lights of the city then it shot off and made the fog off the mountains looks too perfect.. It shot off so fast that all I could get was it going behind me over the roof.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There were no other sightings in Altoona on or around
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: a triangle. I can't find my camera.. .. I SWEAR ... I look outside every night when I smoke a cigarette.... I made my husband go outside to look while he was in the basement.. he said he could not see it.. it's still there ..it looks like water in the sky
